name: soundcloud-playlist-exporter
description: Browser extension to extract and export track information from SoundCloud playlists

scripts.validate: npm run clean && npm install && npm run build && npm run lint
scripts.package: npm run clean && npm install && npm run build && zip -r soundcloud-ext-v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version").zip manifest.json options.html icon-48.png icon.png icon.svg dist/ -x '*.DS_Store'
